scripts.dev_install: bun run build_client && bun run --watch index.tsx --dev-mode
scripts.build_win: bun run build_zip && bun run build_client && bun build ./index.tsx --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/windows/shabti
scripts.build_linux: bun run build_zip && bun run build_client && bun build ./index.tsx --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/linux/shabti
scripts.build_mac: bun run build_zip && bun run build_client && bun build ./index.tsx --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/mac/shabti
